CommSubscriptionConsent.name: CommSubscriptionConsent
CommSubscriptionConsent.description: Represents a customer’s consent to a communication subscription.

BusinessBrandId.description: The ID of the Business Brand that the individual has given consent to for a communication subscription. This is a relationship field. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

CommSubscriptionChannelTypeId.description: ID of the associated communication subscription channel type record.

ConsentCapturedDateTime.description: Required. Date when the customer’s consent was captured.

ConsentCapturedSource.description: Required. Source through which consent was captured. For example, user@example.com or www.example.com.

ConsentGiverId.description: ID of the person who gave consent to the communication subscription on behalf of the contact point. Note If the contact point gave consent, don't use ConsentGiverId.

ContactPointId.description: ID of the contact point, such as an Individual or person account, associated with the communication subscription consent.

DataUsePurposeId.description: Represents the record for data use purpose that you want to associate this consent with. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

EffectiveToDate.description: Date when consent ends. This field is restricted by field-level security.

EngagementChannelTypeId.description: Represents the contact method you want to apply consent to. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. Name of the communication subscription consent record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the account owner associated with this customer.

PartyId.description: Represents the record based on the Individual object that you want to associate consent with. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

PartyRoleId.description: The ID of the Party Role for the individual you want to associate consent with. This is a polymorphic relationship field. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

PrivacyConsentStatus.description: Identifies whether the individual or person account associated with this record agrees to this form of contact.
